tool_description: Indian astrology API for planet positions, ascension calculations, and prediction findings, Basic tools that help in astrological calculations
title: Yawin Indian Astrology

api_list.name: Birth Details
api_list.description: Get Basic astrological details from the birth date and birth time

api_list.name: Get Tamil Calendar Date
api_list.description: Find the Tamil calendar date from the given English calendar date

api_list.name: Convert Planet Degree to  Planet Angle
api_list.description: Convert a Planet Degree to  Angle Format . (Degree is 67.5666666667, converted to Angle as 67.34.0)

api_list.name: Convert Planet Angle  to Planet Degree
api_list.description: Convert a Planet Angle to  Degree Format . (Angle is 67.34.0, converted to Degree as 67.5666666667)

api_list.name: Get Sun Rise and Sun Set Time
api_list.description: Find the Sun Rise and Sun Set Time on a day with timezone

api_list.name: Get Planet Position Angles
api_list.description: Find the Planet position angles on a birth date and time
